titleStmt.title: A sermon preached July 17. 1676. in the Cathedral Church of St. Peter in York, before the Right Honourable Sir Francis North, Lord Chief Justice of the Common Pleas; and the Honourable Vere Bertie Esquire, one of the barons of the Exchequer; His Majesties judges of assize for the Northern Circuit By Thomas Cartwright D.D. and Dean of Ripon, chaplain in ordiary to His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1634-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy: printed by Thomas Newcomb; and are to be sold by Richard Lambert, bookseller in York,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An assize-sermon. Judges 17.6.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
